entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView not rendering items in positions where Headers were, after disabling grouping #16031
  • KeyboardEventArgs attributes Code is "" and Key is "Undefined" on mobile Android. #16030
  • Feature request: A way to profile the performance of XAML bindings #16028
  • PlatformNotSupported exception on iOS Release build from DevOps pipeline #16025
  • DatePicker runtime error during DateSelected event #16022
  • Binding CollectionView/CarouselView to lists of primitive types doesn't work on Release Builds #16021
  • [MAUI][.NET8] Newly created recipes cannot be deleted. #16020
  • WordWrap on labels with padding does not work properly on iOS. #16018
  • Shell TitleView not reliable #16015
  • MAUI push notifications not received in OnMessageReceived unless trimming disabled on android #16014

Closed

  • ImageButton with CornerRadius is not calculated as expected on Android when Padding exists #11874
    Backlog
  • Width/Text rendering on Android Button with ImageSource when ContentLayout set to Top #12288
    Backlog
  • Entry.IsSpellCheckEnabled="False" still shows squiggly line #8558
    Backlog
  • Illegal Clip value did not throw exceptions at compile time and DEBUG mode #12900
    Backlog
  • Maui app softlock #13044
    Backlog
  • How can I export Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility to my component #16016

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #16023
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15988
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    community ✨
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • Refactor `IsRefreshing` property to separate animation and command execution responsibilities #15732
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • Implement rate for TextToSpeech on supported platforms #15528
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/theme
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Use base Width and Height on Android PlatformGraphicsView #15721
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
